macrofocusrange: Super Macro Mode: 5cm to 60cm, Zoom position fixing
exposurecontrol: (1) i Auto (2) P: Programme AE (3) A: Aperture priority AE (4) S: Shutter priority AE (5) M: Manual (6) C1:Custom 1 (7) C2:Custom2 (8) Photo Story (9) Scene select AE (10) Art Filter
weight: 14.2 ounces (Approx. 402g) [including BLS-5 battery and Memory card]
exposurecompensation: -3 EV to +3 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
imagestabilization: System: VCM Mechanical Lens Shift Modes: ON: 2 dimensional activation (yaw/pitch shift), OFF
selftimer: Operation time: 12 sec., 2 sec., Custom, (cancel available)
playback: Single-frame, Information display, Index display (4/9/25 frames), Enlargement (2x - 14x), Movie (with sound, FF/REW/Pause), Picture rotation (auto), Slideshow *(with BGM/BGM+Sound/Sound) * Slideshow : Still/Movie/Still+Movie, When a camera is connected to HDTV with HDMI cable, 3 new slideshow effect can be selectable.(Still)
aperture: Constant f1:2.8 (throughout the entire zoom range)
dimensionswxhxd: 4.5in W x 3.4in H x 2.2in D (116.2mm W x 87mm H x 56.5mm D)
focusareapoint: 35-area multiple AF / All target, Group target area (9-area), Single target
meteringsystem: Digital ESP metering , Center weighted average metering, Spot metering, Spot metering with highlight control, Spot metering with shadow control
focusmodes: Single AF (S-AF) / SuperMacro Mode / Continuous AF (C-AF) / AF tracking (C-AF + TR) / Manual Focus (MF)
storagemedia: SD Memory Card(SDHC, SDXC, UHS-I compatible, Eye-Fi
shutterspeed: 1/2000 - 60 sec. Bulb: default setting 15min. (1/2/4/8/15/20/25/30 min. selectable)
resolution: [RAW] 3968 x 2976 pixels [JPEG] 3968 x 2976 pixels - 640 x 480 pixels
digitalzoom: 2x magnification available via one touch button
viewfinder: Finder Type: Eye-level electronic viewfinder Resolution: 1.44M dots Field of View: Approx. 100% Aspect Ratio: 4:3 Eye point / Diopter Adjustment Range: Approx. 18mm (-1m-1, Distance from rear lens surface) / -4 ~ +2m-1 Magnification: 1.15x (0.58x; 35mm equiv.) Eye Sensor for Automatic On/Off Switch: Yes Displayed Grid: Off / Normal Grid / Golden Grid / Scale / Diagonal selectable Level Gauge: 2-axis level gauge; horizontal /vertical (3D level gauge display available) Brightness Control / Color Temperature: +7 levels and -7 levels / +7 levels and -7 levels EyeCup: Optional EP-11
scenemodes: Portrait, e-Portrait, Landscape, Sport, Night, Night + Portrait, Sunset, Documents, Panorama, Fireworks, Multiplex exposure, Beach & Snow
